alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Dukes; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Nantucket; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 13 at 3:42AM EST until January 13 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.7 to 13.5 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Essex, Suffolk, Eastern Norfolk, Eastern Plymouth, Barnstable, Dukes and Nantucket Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding occurs along Morrissey Boulevard in Boston. Coastal flooding is expected along the North Shore from Gloucester to Newburyport. Wave action will likely cause some washover onto coastal roads around the time of high tide. Minor coastal flooding begins on Easy Street in Nantucket. Expect minor coastal flooding of some low-lying roadways. Minor coastal flooding occurs in Provincetown, in the vicinity of Race Point Road and Provincetown Airport. In Truro backwater flooding occurs along the Pamet River. Minor coastal flooding is expected in the area including Wings Neck. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
